scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run blockchain:dev"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.test: npm run frontend:test && npm run backend:test && npm run blockchain:test
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../blockchain && npm install
